hero.title: Building Infrastructure, Sustaining the Future.
hero.subtitle: Professional excellence in civil construction and environmental legacy for private and government projects worldwide.

value.title: Excellence in Civil Construction and Environmental Legacy
value.desc: We deliver high-impact engineering solutions with unwavering commitment to quality, safety, and sustainable development. Our legacy is built on the strength of our structures and the health of our environment.

services.label: What We Do
services.title: Our Specialized Services
services.desc: We offer comprehensive options in engineering and environment for various sectors.

civil.title: Civil Engineering
civil.desc: Structural design and heavy civil works for industrial and public infrastructure.

env.title: Environmental Legacy
env.desc: Sustainable construction practices and environmental impact mitigation.

mgmt.title: Project Management
mgmt.desc: Integral management ensuring schedules, budgets, and safety standards.

gov.title: Government Projects
gov.desc: Specialized solutions for municipal and federal public works tenders.

cta.title: Ready to Build Your Legacy?
cta.desc: Contact our engineering team today for a comprehensive consultation on your next private or government project.

footer.desc: Defining excellence in the built environment while preserving our planet's natural legacy.

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Defining the landscape of civil engineering through integrity, precision, and a commitment to sustainable infrastructure.

sustainable.title: Building a Sustainable Legacy
sustainable.p1: Founded in 2010, Legado Ambiental has established itself as a cornerstone of engineering excellence in both the public and private sectors. We specialize in complex infrastructure projects that demand high technical competence and environmental sensitivity.
sustainable.p2: Our approach combines traditional engineering mastery with modern sustainable technologies, ensuring that every project we undertake serves the community for generations to come.

mission.title: Mission
mission.desc: To provide state-of-the-art civil engineering solutions that integrate environmental sustainability with technical efficiency, exceeding our clients' expectations in the public and private sectors through an unwavering commitment to quality and safety.

vision.title: Vision
vision.desc: To consolidate ourselves as the leading civil and environmental infrastructure firm in the region, recognized for our innovation capacity, technical resilience, and for leaving a positive legacy in every community where we develop our projects.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The Pillars of Our Success
values.integrity_desc: We act with absolute transparency in every tender and work execution, guaranteeing the trust of our government and private partners.
values.sustainability_desc: We design thinking about tomorrow. We prioritize materials and processes that minimize environmental impact and maximize infrastructure lifespan.
values.excellence_desc: From planning to the last finishing detail, we seek technical and functional perfection in all our engineering challenges.

cta.title: Let's Build the Future Together
cta.desc: Contact our team of experts to discuss how Legado Ambiental can make your next vision a reality with precision and care.

services_page.title: Our Specialized Engineering and Construction Services
services_page.hero_desc: We offer infrastructure and sustainable construction solutions adapted for both private initiative and government initiatives in the region.

private.title: Private Construction
private.desc: Integral engineering for high-end residential complexes, corporate headquarters, and strategic industrial warehouses. We focus on structural excellence and environmental efficiency.

public.title: Government Civil Works
public.desc: Large-scale public infrastructure projects, including urban development, road systems, and essential public facilities. We comply with the highest safety and regulatory standards.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Next Project?
cta.desc: Legado Ambiental brings decades of collective experience to every job. Let's talk about your requirements today.

hero.title: Our Legacy in Infrastructure
hero.desc: Explore a selection of our most impactful projects that define urban landscapes and connect communities.

p1.title: Green Vertex Tower
p1.desc: A 45-story mixed-use building with LEED Platinum certification, integrating vertical gardens and rainwater harvesting systems.

p4.title: Northern Modern Art Museum
p4.desc: A cultural landmark with a unique geometric facade.

cta.title: Ready to Be Part of Our Next Chapter?
cta.desc: We partner with visionaries seeking to build something lasting. Let's start planning your project.

hero.title: A Legacy of Engineering Excellence
hero.desc: Explore the milestones that have defined our growth and impact in the construction industry over the last decade.

2024.title: Global Expansion
2024.desc: Legado Ambiental opened its first international headquarters, marking a new chapter in our mission to provide sustainable solutions on a global scale.

2020.title: The Sustainable Initiative
2020.desc: We launched our Ecological Consulting department, integrating green materials and energy efficiency practices into all our construction projects.

2015.title: First Government Contract
2015.desc: Award of our first major public infrastructure project: the revitalization of the downtown highway system.

2010.title: Foundation
2010.desc: Legado Ambiental was founded by a team of four civil engineers passionate about combining structural integrity with environmental stewardship.

hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.desc: We are here to help with any questions about our services or projects. Fill out the form below or explore our frequently asked questions.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What types of environmental certification do you handle?
faq.a1: We work with LEED, BREEAM, and local environmental impact regulations. Our team can guide the entire certification process for your project.
faq.q2: Do you do projects outside the region?
faq.a2: Yes, our Global Expansion division manages international projects. Contact us to discuss the logistics and viability of your location.
faq.a3: Absolutely. We offer modular services ranging from conceptual design and structural blueprints to complete turnkey construction management.

index_landing.title: Legado Ambiental
index_landing.welcome: Welcome to the environmental preservation project.
